author: the hour
title: EASTER REBELLION: Florida pastor, others flout stay-home orders...
description: TAMPA, Fla. - On the holiest Sunday of the Christian calendar, the Rev. Rodney Howard-Browne was angry. Instead of delivering his Easter sermon to a packed house of parishioners, controversy surrounding the coronavirus pandemic prompted him to live-stream his…
